text:
[Verse]
Moonlight shines bright tonight
Footsteps cutting through the night
We move silent swift and light
Shadows dancing pure delight

[Verse 2]
Hands up hearts beat fast
Moments gone they never last
Feel the rhythm hear the blast
Hold this night let's make it last

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows all around
Feel the magic without sound
Moving free we're unbound
In the night we're spellbound

[Verse 3]
City lights and empty streets
Where the dark and light now meet
Echoes of the pounding beats
Life is short take your seat

[Bridge]
Shadows waltz in moonlit beams
Lost in never-ending dreams
Time fades swiftly or it seems
We're alive in dancing themes

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows all around
Feel the magic without sound
Moving free we're unbound
In the night we're spellbound
title: Dancing Shadows
